scripts.build:release: run-s clean build:client:prod build:release:windows build:release:macos build:release:linux
scripts.build:release:windows: cross-env GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o release/polo-windows-amd64.exe cmd/server/main.go
scripts.build:release:macos:amd64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags "-X github.com/wufe/polo/pkg/storage.configurationFolder=/usr/local/etc/polo" -o release/polo-darwin-amd64 cmd/server/main.go
scripts.build:release:macos:arm64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -ldflags "-X github.com/wufe/polo/pkg/storage.configurationFolder=/usr/local/etc/polo" -o release/polo-darwin-arm64 cmd/server/main.go
scripts.build:release:linux:amd64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags "-X github.com/wufe/polo/pkg/storage.configurationFolder=/etc/polo" -o release/polo-linux-amd64 cmd/server/main.go
scripts.build:release:linux:arm64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=arm64 go build -ldflags "-X github.com/wufe/polo/pkg/storage.configurationFolder=/etc/polo" -o release/polo-linux-arm64 cmd/server/main.go
scripts.test:trace: cross-env POLO_CWD=$INIT_CWD GO_ENV=development POLO_DIAGNOSTICS=true go test -v ./cmd/tests/...
scripts.test:trace:watch: cross-env POLO_CWD=$INIT_CWD GO_ENV=development POLO_DIAGNOSTICS=true gow test -v ./cmd/tests/...
